title: Border
body: Hey, where is my silver border? My frends all get the borders only not me.. why?

replies.body: Rewards are still being distributed!  We aim to have this all done by the 21st, per the [Season 6 FAQ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon).  Hang tight until then, and the rewards will come!
